name: horison-defaults
description: Horison platform plugin: 7 auto-configured MCP servers (Supabase, Playwright, Context7, Memory, Firebase, Serena, Langfuse Docs) + 2 manual (Neo4j, Langfuse), 10 agents (GCP architect, Supabase pro, Neo4j graph expert, Langfuse ops, KG pipeline dev, code reviewer, security analyzer, and more), 7 skills, and hooks.
